alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL WICOMICO...WORCESTER AND NORTHERN ACCOMACK COUNTIES... At 831 PM EDT, radar indicated strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Selbyville to Newark to 8 miles south of Snow Hill. Movement was east at 35 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail are possible with these storms. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Berlin, Snow Hill, Cape Isle Of Wight, Ocean Pines, Newark, Willards, Horntown, Bishop, Ocean City Municipality, Greenbackville, Wallops Island, Cedartown, Powellville, Mount Wesley, Showell, Whiton, Boxiron, Bishopville and Public Landing. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They can relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Wakefield.
